name: Notion Invoice Template for Free
description: Create your minimal and clean Invoice fast!Introducing my sleek and professional invoice template for digital products! My template is fully customizable and easy to use, making it perfect for freelancers and small businesses. It includes fields for service or item description, quantity, unit price, and total amount, as well as a section for contact information and payment details. Included with embedded Paypal payment and your customer can pay your invoice only with one click.The template is co
features: Minimal and clean design; Automatic calculate the pricing; You can add your hourly Price and Qty and automatic calculate the Total price; Embedded Paypal widget with one click payment; You can export .PDF from Notion; Share it with simple external link to your customers; You can choose your button style from Paypal herehttps://www.paypal.com/buttons/; Go to Apption website, create an accounthttps://apption.co/; Go to this page and follow these few steps, its easyhttps://apption.co/apps/paypal
